original: Ekelund, Gunnar, kommendör, Karlskrona, f. 7/10/72 i Ljungby av här:skriv. Sven Gust. Aug. E. o. Jeanna Hasselgren. G. 99 m. Ellen Ingegärd Margareta Möller. Barn: Sven, bruksdisp., Vere, g. Heilborn, Hans, major v. kustart. — Sjöoff :ex., KSHS. Und:löjtn. v. flottan 94, löjtn. 97, kapt. 03, ikomimendÖTkiapt. av 2. gr. 16, av 1. gr. 18, kommendör i marinen 26. Dir. i Flottans pens :kassa. RSO, RRS [-:t-A03k],-] {+:t- A03k],+} LÖS.
translated: Ekelund, Gunnar, Commander, Karlskrona, born on October 7, 1872 in Ljungby, son of army clerk Sven Gust. Aug. E. and Jeanna Hasselgren. Married in 1899 to Ellen Ingegärd Margareta Möller, with whom he had three children: Sven, manager, Vere, married Heilborn, and Hans, major of the Coastal Artillery. He was a naval officer, having served as a second lieutenant in the navy since 1894, lieutenant since 1897, captain since 1903, commander of the 2nd group since 1916 and 1st group since 1918, and Commander in the Navy since 1926. He was also Director of the Navy's Pension Fund. He was awarded the Royal Order of the Sword, Royal Red Cross of Sweden, and the Order of Vasa.
